snippet: An explosion on Tuesday killed dozens of people, but there were conflicting accounts of what caused the blast, and some reports put the death toll higher.
abstract: Bomb kills more than two dozen people at military base north of Baghdad, Iraq; officials give conflicting accounts of what causes explosion.

byline.contributor: Alan Cowell contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: An explosion on Tuesday killed dozens of people, but there were conflicting accounts of what caused the blast, and some reports put the death toll higher.

headline.seo: Lethal Blast Rocks Iraq Military Base
headline.main: Bombing at Iraqi Base Kills Dozens
headline.print_headline: Bombing At Iraqi Base Kills Dozens
